bench

Interface IReferee

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bench

    public interface IReferee
    Referee interface of Bench instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void assertTrialDecision()
      The referee will waken up the coaches with the trialDecisionTaken = true and with the notifyAll().
      void callTrial()
      The referee must wait that all the coaches are waiting for the call trial and all the contestants are in the bench, then the referee can continue the trial, it will reset all the flags, the flag to the contestants selected in the Team A or B and set the coaches wait for call trial to zero.
      void wakeUp()
      This method will wakeup all the entities in the bench and declare that the match was ended.

    • Method Detail

      • callTrial

        void callTrial()
        The referee must wait that all the coaches are waiting for the call trial and all the contestants are in the bench, then the referee can continue the trial, it will reset all the flags, the flag to the contestants selected in the Team A or B and set the coaches wait for call trial to zero. The coachs are sleeping and need the flag callTrialTaken true to procede. In the final there is a notifyAll() to wake up all the entities in the Bench.

      • assertTrialDecision

        void assertTrialDecision()
        The referee will waken up the coaches with the trialDecisionTaken = true and with the notifyAll().

      • wakeUp

        void wakeUp()
        This method will wakeup all the entities in the bench and declare that the match was ended.
